name: Simon (Technex, Xeoeon)
description:
This was a first year project from the Academy of Interactive Entertainment where we recreated the game Simon using AIE's Bootstrap.

Simon is a memory game where you repeat a randomly generated pattern that constantly increases in length as you progress through the game. The game has four colored buttons, each producing a particular tone when it is pressed or activated by the machine. 

Controls:
Red = Q
Green = E
Blue = A
Yellow = D

Developed by:
Kosta Nassis - https://www.technexgames.com/
